column4: I've 50gb unallocated disc space on my another physical HDD, can I somehow add it to the filesystem space that's on 1st physical HDD?
I've gparted, just havent figured out how to use it properly
If you did not set up your HDDs for LVM in first place, then this is not possible.  You would need to set it up firsthand before you install it.  You're looking for LVM -- Logical Volume Management.
